A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This fanfic\, not only ruined itself\, the other two movies in its trilogy (one yet to release)\, but the originals that allowed it to even come into existence. (I speculate it hurt Solo's sales as well)\n\nRyan Johnson claimed to be a Star Wars fan since childhood\, and in doing so\, he sent the fans into a civil war. Johnson planted himself in the history books with this\, just in what is possibly the worst film to have ever hit the big screen to date.
